mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HabitCommunity (habit_id, habit_likes, participants, complete, upload_date) VALUES (#{habitId}, #{habitLikes}, #{participants}, #{complete}, #{uploadDate})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT h.category_name, h.habit_title, u.nickname, hc.habit_likes, hc.participants, hc.upload_date FROM HabitCommunity hc JOIN Habit h ON hc.habit_id = h.habit_id JOIN User u ON h.writer_id = u.user_id WHERE h.category_name = #{categoryName} ORDER BY hc.upload_date DESC
